a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:43): hey, one more thing I wanted to ask about is, are the v.nu schemas meant to be up-to-date with the spec, or do you have a TODO list for changes that need to be made?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:43): I ask specifically because I notice that ol@reversed is not in the schema yet

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:47): http://bugzilla.validator.nu/buglist.cgi?component=HTML5+schema&bug_status=NEW is the TODO list. If there's something that isn't implemented and isn't on that list, it's a defect in the list
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:47): goes add ol@reversed
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:48): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: @reversed the only missing case I've noticed so far
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:50): checked in
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:50): will deploy in a moment
